oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-10-29 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 29, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer - although Faron Young was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Bobby Lord, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1099th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Porter Wagoner; Archie Campbell; Bobby Lord; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Porter Wagoner -- Company's Comin' (Porter Wagoner) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Bobby Lord -- Hawkeye (Bobby Lord) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Porter Wagoner) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Snowflake Reel (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner talk -- Lord I'm Coming Home (Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Chet Atkins -- Delicado (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wagoner, Porter; Lord, Bobby
